definition: (bird species of China) brambling (Fringilla montifringilla)/(fig.) small fry

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan
lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom)/fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?
pinyin: yan4 que4 an1 zhi1 hong2 hu2 zhi1 zhi4

definition: lit. sparrow and swallow, crow and magpie; fig. any Tom, Dick or Harry/a bunch of nobodies
lit. can the sparrow and swallow know the will of the great swan? (idiom); fig. how can we small fry predict the ambitions of the great?
pinyin: yan4 que4 yan1 zhi1 hong2 gu3 zhi1 zhi4

definition: lit. sparrow and swallow's congratulation (idiom); fig. to congratulate sb on completion of a building project/congratulations on your new house!
lit. a caged bird in a pavilion (idiom); fig. to lose vigilance by comfortable living/unaware of the disasters ahead/a fool's paradise
(bird species of China) common chaffinch (Fringilla coelebs)
lit. a caged bird in a pavilion (idiom); fig. to lose vigilance by comfortable living/unaware of the disasters ahead/a fool's paradise

sentences.english: Thorpe also showed that the chaffinch is selective imitate.
sentences.chinese: 索普还证明，苍头燕雀学歌是有所选择的。

sentences.english: God knows where even a sparrow calls home.
sentences.chinese: 上帝自然哪里都知道，甚至是燕雀窝。

sentences.english: Give up little minds of swallows, and hold high aspirations of swans .
sentences.chinese: 弃燕雀之小志，慕鸿鹄而高翔。

sentences.english: We wake every morning to the sound of a finch singing.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨醒来时还能听到燕雀的歌唱。

sentences.english: The swallows and sparrows are very pleased to find a place on the roof of the hall for their nests.
sentences.chinese: 燕雀为拥有屋顶下面的一个位置而欣慰不已。

sentences.english: If you keep your head you will be all right.
sentences.chinese: 燕雀为拥有屋顶下面的一个位置而欣慰不已。

sentences.english: And I can tell that you are high flyers……
sentences.chinese: 我知道，你们都是鸿鹄，而非燕雀。

definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian wren (Troglodytes troglodytes)
(bird species of China) Eurasian jackdaw (Coloeus monedula)
(bird species of China) barn swallow (Hirundo rustica)
